document_data.name: Jermander
document_data.mainbody: '''Jermander''' was a [[tiefling]] swordsman and a member of the [[Bounty Hunters of Cavus Dun]] in the mid-to-late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Jermander was a swordsman and the leader of the Cavus Dun squad tasked by [[Effron]] with finding [[Dahlia Sin'felle]] and [[Drizzt Do'Urden]].
